title: To Escape Poachers, Rhinos Are Airlifted To Safer Areas
teaser: Conservationists in South Africa and Zimbabwe are relocating rhinos by airplane to safer habitats elsewhere in Africa. David Greene talks to Raoul du Toit, who runs  Lowveld Rhino Trust in Zimbabwe.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
